front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Pad-Mounted-Type, Self-Cooled, Single-Phase Distribution Transformers 250 kVA and Smaller: High Voltage, 34 500 GrdY/19 920 V and Below; Low Voltage, 480/240 V and Below - Corrigendum 1: Correct an omission in the label of Figure 1.

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: An error has been identified in the 2014 published version of IEEE Std C57.12.38(TM). Two dimensions were provided for the high voltage bushing height above the base of the transformer. The lower dimension (597+114/-13) should have been designated as being for units 167 and 250 kVA only. This error needs to be corrected.
